name: Halfling Tycoon: Fantasy
description:
Halfling Tycoon is a medieval and fantasy management game. The player has to contribute with the village’s growth and conquest new areas. In order to do so, soldier units must be trained and defeat big bosses while the peasants collect resources, which are used to build new areas and expand with new technology.

Do you like economic strategy games? Then this great game for you. Build and develop your village in this time management game. Unlock a variety of upgrades and enjoy the game.

Help Barry to build and defend his Halfling village from gigantic monsters. Train your halfling warrior, go conquest and beat all the monster. Halfling Tycoon is a unique idle strategy game. Halfling is another name for J. R. R. Tolkien’s Hobbit, a fictional race found in some fantasy novels and games. They are often depicted as similar to humans except about half as tall.

In game you as the farmer who on an empty site tries to develop, earn and become man of means. In fact it is possible to call game a clicker as you help clicking on a cow, food, the wood. Get a tree, water, tangerines, food, milk sell and receive gold. Develop and improve fields, the village, mines and a farm.

Gather resources and expand your town of Halflings in this fun, free and easy to play. Manage stock such as wood, fish, milk and oranges. Build houses and keep the Halflings happy. Can you complete the Halfling tycoon challenge?

 

INSTRUCTIONS :

Your objective is to gather several resources that will help you to build your business and become richer than rich. You can work on your farm, in the mine, the village and the forest as you go on conquests to increase your property. Try to reach all achievements and click every stuff.

Halfheim the last village of halflings is in danger. You need to train your halfling warrior, do conquest, manage your resources and prepare for battle against those dreaded monsters!

Enjoy and share with your friends!

** The game has a resolution of 700x500px**

**If you like Halfling Tycoon, please make a donation to support our team.**
